title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 15 of 2022) shall come into operation:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Regulation of Providers of Building
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Regulation of Providers of Building 

Works and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited regulation provider building work miscellaneous provision act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 15 of 2022) shall come into operation:
heading: 2. The 29th day of August 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 29th day of August 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Regulation of Providers of Building Works and 
Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 15 of 2022) shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1; 

(b) Part 2; 

(c) Part 3; 

(d) 

(e) 

section 60 in so far as it relates to an offence under paragraph 
2(10) of Schedule 2, and paragraph 7(2) of Schedule 2; 

section 63(2) in so far as it relates to an offence under paragraph 
2(10) of Schedule 2; 

(f) Part 8; 

(g) Schedule 2. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 August, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [429] 3
